long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Group Your favourite streamers based on category, people or game and then check if anyone from that group is currenyly live. 

No need to have a twitch account!

You can use the extension whenever You want, even being on different page than twitch.

add up to 10 groups and 10 streamers to each group.

ISSUES:
There might be some issues while using groupTwitchStreamers extensions and 7TV extension together

7TV is blocking user manipulations directly on page, meaning that groups from groupTwitchStreamers extension on the left side panel on twitch won't be displayed properly
